description: IntroductionThe USB 3.0 to SATA adapter allows you to connect any 3.5" or 2.5" SATA drive to your computer for fast USB 3.0 data transfer. Back up, move or archive your notebook or PC HDD files quickly and easily with the USB 3.0 to SATA adapter.The USB 3.0 to SATA adapter supports super-fast USB 3.0 (up to 5 Gbps) data transfer rates to ensure maximum data transfer speeds in minimal time.Specification- Output interface: USB 3.0/2.0- Power input: 100-240V, 50/60Hz- Output: DC 12V/2A- HDD Compatible: All 2.5"/3.5" SATA HDDPackage include1 USB 3.0 to SATA Adapter Cable (3ft), 1 Power AdapterPLEASE NOTETo ensure safe operation, power the 2.5-inch HDD/SDD via the USB port other than the adapter is recommended.About Anker UspeedThe Anker Uspeed line produces reliable computer peripherals with the latest technology standards. Using quality materials, Anker Uspeed products offer superior data transmission, power consumption, and compatibility.
title: Anker® Uspeed USB 3.0 to SATA 3 feet Converter Adapter Cable for 2.5 inch/3.5 inch Hard Drive HDD SSD with 12V 2A External AC Power Adapter
